citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A female rabbit was seen to have an abnormal gait in its hind limbs. A facility representative said this has been monitored
for over a month and seen to continue to eat and drink, but the attending veterinarian has not been contacted. It was seen
to be eating during inspection and in good body condition but the abnormal gait needs to be reported to the attending
veterinarian when first noticed to ensure that the condition isn't painful or that if it is a treatable condition the treatment can
be started. Ensure to contact the attending veterinarian and have this rabbit evaluated by the attending veterinarian and
follow the veterinarian's treatment plan.
***Correct by June 4, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A female rabbit was seen to have an abnormal gait in its hind limbs. A facility representative said this has been monitored 
for over a month and seen to continue to eat and drink, but the attending veterinarian has not been contacted. It was seen 
to be eating during inspection and in good body condition but the abnormal gait needs to be reported to the attending 
veterinarian when first noticed to ensure that the condition isn't painful or that if it is a treatable condition the treatment can 
be started. Ensure to contact the attending veterinarian and have this rabbit evaluated by the attending veterinarian and 
follow the veterinarian's treatment plan.  
***Correct by June 4, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
